data.eml:eml: A new species of scincid lizard in the genus Oligosoma (Reptilia: Scincidae) from the mid-Canterbury high country, New Zealand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Whitaker, Tony, Chapple, David G., Hitchmough, Rodney A., Lettink, Marieke, Patterson, Geoff B. (2018): A new species of scincid lizard in the genus Oligosoma (Reptilia: Scincidae) from the mid-Canterbury high country, New Zealand. Zootaxa 4377 (2): 269-279, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4377.2.7
